column1: Local Foods////Omg...the avocado toast was the bomb!  I love how fresh this place is.  I got the egg truffle sandwich and it was great. It was big enough for me to take half of it home.  My mom got the vegan chili and kept thinking it had meat in it
column2: because it was that good!  Ice tea is a bit pricey by the way.  (4$). The did have homemade strawberry lemonade.
